publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-310.3 Mr Mark Ruskell: Strategic Framework for Aquaculture-As an amendment to motion (S2M-310) in the name of Allan Wilson, insert at end " and calls upon the Executive to commit itself to an action plan with dedicated resources in order to implement and monitor the programme and to devote more attention to organic fish farming, shellfish farming and the impact on, and of, commercial sea fisheries.
